trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONEEXCHANGE_00153_HELP<tab>Seems every other day we stop dealing in this or that type of tomestone. Inevitably, there comes a point when Rowena says that they're not worth the hassle anymore.

TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONEEXCHANGE_00153_TALK_NOT_HAVE<tab>Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, bring them here and I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
TEXT_CMNDEFTOMESTONEEXCHANGE_00153_TALK_Q<tab>Might be as I still have use for them, though. If you have any you don't need, I'll give you something more desirable in exchange.
